title: Yu-gi-oh! Trading Card Game Duel Masters Guide
description:
Nothing stripped but Encryption and Region. 
DVD5, DVD-R, NTSC, ISO 
Basically it teaches you how to play the game. 

Format: Animated, Collector&#039;s Edition, DVD-Video 
Language: English 
Subtitles: English 
Region: Region Free 
Number of discs: 1 
Studio: YU-GI-OH 

YU-GI-OG TRADING CARD GAME DUEL MASTERS GUIDE. FIRST TIME ON DVD A TRADING CARD GAME WITH COMPLETE OFFICIAL RULES ON HOW TO PLAY AND TRADE YU-GI-OH CARDS. DVD FEATURES PROLOGUE, PREPARATION, CARD DETAILD, PHASES OF GAMEPLAY, BATTLE & DAMAGE, SAMPLE DUEL, AND MORE DETAILS ON HOLOGRAMS AND MORE COLLECTORS CARDS. THIS DVD MAKES IT FUN AND EXCITING TO PLAY AND TRADE WITH YU-GI-OH CARDS. 40 MIN RUNNING TIME. FUN FOR ALL AGES.
